overview:
Aneesh designs user experiences, writes code, and manages products.

Aneesh is the technical product manager for AdJitsu by Cooliris. AdJitsu exists to power ads that are responsive, engaging and just plain awesome; as fast and full-featured as the best native mobile apps.

Aneesh served as the user experience lead for NVIDIA Optimus (a consumer technology for maximizing battery life and performance) and NVIDIA Surround (a popular product for multi-screen gaming). His work experience spans Microsoft, Apple Retail, and lecturing at the University of Wisconsin - Madison.

Aneesh builds interactive prototypes for the purposes of usability testing and product ideation. His core competencies include realtime 3D and information visualization. He works with a variety of high and low-level tools including Quartz Composer, Expression Blend, Silverlight, Processing, and Java.

milestones.description:
Plan platform features, coordinate software delivery, direct creative efforts, and evangelize AdJitsu to business partners.

AdJitsu is a mobile ad platform that features speed, animation, interactive 3D products and 3D environments.
